generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance with cars driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and trees.
- building: Buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass patches are visible along the sidewalks and between the road and buildings.
- sky: The sky is partially visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road and some are driving in the distance.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the road near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a yellow directional sign and a parking sign.
- pole: Poles supporting traffic signs are visible along the road.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
